title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Entrepreneurship Education Assessment Item Development: Higher-Order Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational entrepreneurship concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design 20 project-based entrepreneurial mindset assessment items that measure higher-order thinking skills (HOTS)
Learners can apply methods to analyze the validity of HOTS-based items using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT)
Learners can improve creative and critical thinking assessment items aligned with entrepreneurial education goals according to expert review criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
